Game.Name: Hello Kitty Birthday Adventures
Game.Plot: Help Hello Kitty find the perfect birthday presents! Collect stamps and stickers for Hello Kitty's birthday book by playing mini-games, helping friends, and finding special objects. By winning the mini-games you will get hints for birthday gifts. Attend special holiday parties throughout the year. Deliver birthday presents to your favorite Sanrio Characters. Features • Spend time visiting friends, hanging out, and shopping for gifts in 5 different locations: Central Square, Forest, Grassy Hill, Main Street, and Downtown • Includes many Sario Characters • Over 100 mini-game styles: varies for each character or goal • Fully realized Hello Kitty world • Blow out the birthday candles using the DS microphone
